entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 March 2023
